multicast-dns-service-types

Parse and stringify mdns service types

npm install multicast-dns-service-types

Usage

``` js var types = require(‘multicast-dns-service-types’)

console.log(types.stringify({name: ‘http’, protocol: ‘tcp’, subtypes: [‘sub1’, ‘sub2’]})) // _http._tcp._sub1._sub2 console.log(types.parse(‘_http._tcp._sub1._sub2’)) // {name: ‘http’, protocol: ‘tcp’, subtypes: [‘sub1’, ‘sub2’]} ```

The following shorthands also exist

js types.stringify(name, protocol, subtypes) types.tcp(name, subtypes) // set protocol to tcp types.udp(name, subtypes) // set protocol to udp
